comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Leslie Russell Clark, Class of 1918, was a freshman quarterback (Number 24) and Leonard Hulit Norcross, Class of 1918, played Left Half Back (Number 17) for Brown University football, in this game against Cornell University, October 24, 1914 at the Polo Grounds (Brush Stadium) in New York. Cornell trounced defeated Brown 28 - 7.   — [1] [2]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Pixel Wrangler:  Thanks for giving us the fuller names of these players, the location of the game, and the date on the negative.  We will add more details to the image description when we update.
